SELECT bc.trade_no_xgxy, u.real_name, cb.status, bc.repay_amount AS repaid_amount, (bc.amount + bc.interest_amount + bc.sum_repaid_interest + bc.poundage_amount + bc.sum_repaid_poundage + bc.overdue_amount + bc.sum_repaid_overdue - bc.repay_amount) AS unrepay_amount, bc.gmt_plan_repayment AS gmt_due, bc.overdue_day AS overdue_days, MAX(bcr.gmt_create) AS gmt_last_repay FROM jsd_collection_borrow cb INNER JOIN jsd_borrow_cash bc ON cb.borrow_id = bc.id INNER JOIN jsd_user u ON bc.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN jsd_borrow_cash_repayment bcr ON cb.borrow_id = bcr.borrow_id WHERE bc.is_delete = 0
AND cb.status = #{status}
AND (bc.trade_no_xgxy LIKE '${searchContent}%' OR u.real_name LIKE '%${searchContent}%')
